name: UpdatePagerdutyAddon
description:
Update an existing add-on in PagerDuty.

This tool updates a specific add-on in PagerDuty by embedding a given URL in an iframe accessible through the UI. It requires the 'addons.write' OAuth scope.

parameters.name: resource_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the add-on resource to be updated.

parameters.name: accept_version_header
parameters.description: The versioning header for API requests, usually a string indicating the API version.

value_schema.description: The `Accept` header is used as a versioning header.

parameters.name: content_type_header
parameters.description: Specify the media type of the request body. Must be 'application/json'.

parameters.name: updated_addon_details
parameters.description: JSON object with the details of the add-on to be updated, such as 'src' URL for embedding.
